description.p: Ben'nir tend to be daunting, looking almost dreamlike. Their physique closeley resembles those of elven children, however they tend to be more beautiful and endearing to the human eye. The only thing distinguishing this childlike people from their elven cousins are their white glowing irises, which eneable them to see where others don't.
Ben'nir are the children of long dead stars, that have been sent to the mortal realm to explore and quench the curiosity of their ancestors and bring light into every aspect of creation.
Ben'nir tend to be crafty marksmen and powerful magicians. So they often take the role of individuals that are kind of separated from their society.
Ben'nir take names from the societies they interact with, but pronounce them in a more guttural and primordial way, hence the different sound of many names.

Male:Leo, A'ira, 'ariel, Ga'anagan
Female:Rea, Gal'den, An'ara, 'aria
Ben'nir are the children of stars.

Ability Score Increase.Your Wisdom score increases by 3, and your Dexterity or Strength score increases by 2.
Age.Ben'nir being the children of stars are unable to age and they always take on a childlike appearence. Otherwise they are immortal.
Alignment.Hence having no affiliation with the world, Ben'nir tend towards chaotic and neutral alignments.
Size.Ben'nir are the same size and build as humans. Your size is Medium.
Speed.Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Wings.Your spectral wings grant you a flying speed of 50 feet.
Truesight.You have truesight out to 120 feet.
Radiant Soul.You are immune to radiant and resistant to fire damage.
Radiant Being. Due to your heritage as a star you are immune to being charmed or frightened, and magic can’t put you to sleep. For you watched those beings for thousands of years noothing can shock nor lull you anymore.Any spells that would cause the caster to take damage deal half that rounded up.
Starchild.You are a Starchild. You do not need to eat, drink, breathe, or sleep. You never make Endurance checks to resist the effect of starvation, thirst, exhaustion, or suffocation. However you still benefit from short and long rests. All other conditions and effects affect you normally.
Radiant Origin.You know the Produce Flame cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the Burning hands spell at will as a 2nd-level spell. Once you reach 5th level, you can also cast Alter Self at will. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
Languages.You can speak, read, and write Common, Celestial and Druidic.
You are immune to radiant and resistant to fire damage.
